actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide additional assistance to small employers.

summary.text: Provides, under the Occupational Safety and Health Act, that the Secretary of Labor may render on-site consultation to small employers, upon their request, to assist such employers with complying with the Act, and may make the issuance of citations for safety and health violations discretionary.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide additional assistance to small employers.
